website_summaries.verdict: The Vizio D24f-F1 is a budget-priced 24-inch 1080p TV that might be a good fit for your kitchen or guest room.
pros: Good streaming content options with Google Cast support

customer_reviews.title: False advertising. This tv is 720p not 1080p.
customer_reviews.text: I researched for a long time before purchasing to what I thought was a 1080p tv, turns out it’s false advertising. Only got 720p. Returning this piece of junk. Thanks for nothing. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: ashley Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great little tv.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tv. Though a bit expensive. I wish I bought I something slight bigger but I needed it to fit on my dresser. Great picture. Easy to set up. Good WiFi connection. Suggestion: If you have a fire stick I highly suggest not wasting your money on a smart tv. Made that mistake after the fact.
customer_reviews.author: Reynna

customer_reviews.title: but it works great and has a very crisp picture
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this product a long time. It has been running a couple months, but it works great and has a very crisp picture. Great price as well. Easy setup and works great as a TV and as a computer monitor. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chooch

customer_reviews.title: Great picture. I had it installed in my RV ...
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. I had it installed in my RV bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: janet merrill

customer_reviews.title: Decent tv not good for gaming or fast scenes
customer_reviews.text: Decent tv. Gameplay is not smooth on it being laggy and jumpy on fast motion scenes. Lacks optical out and requires a proprietary cable for connections other than hdmi
customer_reviews.author: Adam Webb

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this TV for our kitchen about a month ago. Unlike the LG model we purchased previously (and returned), this one was very easy to set-up. Great picture!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Awald

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch!! Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE TV'S TURNS OFF AND DOESN'T RURN BACK ON EVEN AFTER YOU CYCLE THE POWER OR WHATEVER THEY TRIED CALLING IT......JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: So frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The remote connection is TERRIBLE. Swapped out many batteries before learning there's a known problem with this model. To fix, unplug the TV and hold the power button on the back of the TV down for 15 seconds (to drain all power from TV) and the remote will work again. This fix is temporary and you'll have to repeat it every couple days or your remote won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and a snap to to work with wireless
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Great picture and a snap to to work with wireless.
customer_reviews.author: mlangdn

customer_reviews.title: sound
customer_reviews.text: CON, upon arrival we notice that the sound quality was very poor. tried playing with the sound settings, but beside balance that is are the is. I might have kept it, but i found that when switching between hdmi 1 and hdmi 2 the sound came out garbled and only cleared after turning off the tv then on again, this happens every time. my Pro is that the picture is great!
customer_reviews.author: dart

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Vizio TV!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV. Easy to set up. Great picture and easy to use. There is only one problem and I found the remote control totally inadequate. I really like the remote for my other Vizio TV. ⭐️ ZdalaMit New XRT112 Remote Control fit forVizio Smart Internet LED TV with Netflix/iHeart Radio/Amazon Prime keys. Also has fast forward, play, pause, and reverse keys handy for movies etc.
customer_reviews.author: VASHON ISLANDER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small tv
customer_reviews.text: Amazing television , I don't care for the Amazon App... Can not access your prime music ect...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not smart enough
customer_reviews.text: This TV does have both wireless and wired Internet. However, it will not play .mp3 nor .mp4 files from a file server and it does NOT have a web browser. If there isn't an app for what you want to watch, you'll out of luck. It's an OK TV, but priced too high for the few other features it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E.

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi, no Bluetooth...
customer_reviews.text: which doesn't matter, since the TruSurround is very good. I stream my Amazon Video library: smooth and clear.. The Amazon app is the top right button on the remote. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: P ski

customer_reviews.title: Picture great, sound not so much
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a super thin TV. There’s room for better speakers. I’m now looking for a small sound bar to go with this purchase. TV picture is great. I have it set at Vivid, brightness 75, color 55, sharpness 60.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Costs me a whole $5.00 to operate, per year
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV and bought a second model after my first. It is very power efficient. That's what I'm talking about! Not to mention its low on fuel use and good for the Earth's environment.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture, Not so Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Picture is good, WiFi connectivity will get just about any service you want. I found the sound harsh, tinny and thin. Use this in my kitchen mostly when I'm preparing dinner. Bought a small sound bar to substitute for the built-in speakers; it is a significant improvement. Only disappointment is no matter what connection I used to feed the sound bar, the Mute button on the TV remote had no effect. As long as this TV is "on" and tuned to a broadcast I can't mute it. Even tried playing with the "speaker" settings on the TV, again can't mute the sound bar, and the remote's volume control does nothing either. Only the sound bar volume control works.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Vizio TVs. All are high quality. This model is no different and has an excellent picture. The additional features are nice and are easy to access. Set-up was easy and quick. BUT, the sound quality is only fair. The remote has a lot of nice features, but is not the easiest to use. So, buy the TV, get an inexpensive sound bar, and deal with the remote. For a small TV this seems to be a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: jack h

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I literally unboxed this, plugged it in, and started watching. What a breeze! Great picture, easy intuitive controls, works alone or with my fire stick, and with the sleep timer is absolutely perfect for my guest room. I've had friends and family like it so much they've gone to buy one for their bedooms. I love this little lightwight high performing tv!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Great for your buck! Perfect for our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We love having this as our kitchen TV. It is perfect size, sound is adequate (its not a bose), and picture is great. If you are looking quality for your money, here it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Was the perfect size and has great features for an inexpensive TV. Love Netflix and of course Prime Video that has all of the features we love. Very happy with decision.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Ok TV
customer_reviews.text: Overall the TV is ok. The sound quality through the TV’s speakers is shallow and could be a lot better. Picture quality is also ok but not great. I connected a portable speaker through the Mic port with an Aux cord and the sound is much better. It was a very easy setup once the software updates were finished but it takes 15 to 20 seconds for the picture to come on after you push the on button.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reception
customer_reviews.text: I bought the supposedly Smart TV to watch Disney+, only to find out that Vizio TV's don't work with Disney+. The TV is also slow when changing functions. And the wireless reception is bad. Every other device in my house works with my signal extender. This TV is the only device that does not. So the signal is very weak. And the digital antennae reception misses one of the major channels locally that we watch, even though the signal is located less than 10 miles away as the crow flies. The antennae, is the current best rated digital antenna on CNET.com.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Not a good TV
customer_reviews.text: I've only be using this TV for 2 months and now it doesn't work. I can't change anything with the remote. But I know the remote works because I've installed new batteries and I can still select "menu" and turn tv on/off with remote. But nothing else. The buttons on the back are only for volume and on/off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Considering the low price this is a great tv.
customer_reviews.text: I use this tv in a bedroom often while working on laundry. I am still figuring out the settings. The 1080 p is what I wanted and I was pleasantly surprised. The size is perfect. The sound is alright. I was hoping it would be better than what I read in other reviews. Overall I am happy with the clarity, colors and the picture it delivers for this size of tv.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: VALUE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a value ! Great picture and sound ! Going to also buy a larger size for a different room in our home !
customer_reviews.author: Oheckyeah

customer_reviews.title: It died on me.
customer_reviews.text: Last time I turned it on it wouldn't. I tried the remote from my other Vizio and it worked once but then quit entirely. I won't be getting another Vizio and now I don't trust the one in my bedroom. I'll be staying with LG.
customer_reviews.author: bbkong

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The CPU in this roku-with-a-screen is S-L-O-W. Be aware, it can be frustrating, especially upon startup and when rewinding or fast-forwarding. Better off spending $100 more on a Samsung or LG smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Beaudoin

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love Vizio's quality to price ratio, however this TV is hot garbage. The operating system is horribly laggy and slow, the TV freezes sometimes requiring you to unplug/replug and I've randomly had my settings erased. With how cheap and available computing systems are nowadays there is no excuse for the ancient trash they put inside this TV. I would have rather spent my money on a Raspberry Pi and a non smart tv or monitor and made my own "Smart TV" for less money and triple the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to read on screen information.
customer_reviews.text: On screen information is difficult to read. Key information is in small letters while general information is in large bold letters. Remote control is not the best either.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV and the perfect size for my office. I purchased it to go in my kitchen, but tried it in my office to see if it would fit. It works perfectly, now I might need to get another one for the kitchen. LOL
customer_reviews.author: preecherkid

customer_reviews.title: wi-fi
customer_reviews.text: I need a smart TV for my RV. Now I can wi-fi hotspots and stream in programs.
customer_reviews.author: John Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Have this in the kitchen for OTA programs Quick to change channels and fits right in under counter. Yet to try the apps using by HS internet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phifer

customer_reviews.title: Turns on by itself!!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV seems to have a mind of its own. It switches inputs while I'm watching a movie or a show. So frustrating. This is seriously the WORST TV I've ever had. Also, the buttons on the remote are small and difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: Yllek Tsew

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up; only one yet unresolved issue
customer_reviews.text: My problem continues to be connecting this new TV to my DirectTV remote. The problem may be with DirectTV.
customer_reviews.author: JEK

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I have ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst example of electronics I have ever experienced. I am an electrical engineer having owned two companies and if I had this product knowing how awful it’s performance is I would either remove it or fold up because this is the worst example of technology I have. Evver exxperieced if you purchase this product you are in flor the biggest disappointment you will ever experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tugboat B.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any complaints. I love it. Picture is great and remote easy to use. I have it in a small room in my house. Enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: margaret martin

customer_reviews.title: All good except for voice
customer_reviews.text: Voice has a weird sound. Like it’s muffled and off key.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Schales

customer_reviews.title: Had one year and TV has died...
customer_reviews.text: Started acting up a couple weeks ago. It has died exactly one year from purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CHEF_nato

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: My main reason I use this TV for is in our kitchen and love the Apps for many movies and shows.Excellant tv for spare rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J.

customer_reviews.title: Too much needs to be done
customer_reviews.text: There's no hardcopy manual. I can't find a way to adjust the time. The menu writing is too small. The aspect adjustment needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: RosG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our kitchen, love to watch tv while working in the kitchen and with the arm bracket it’s a perfect addition
customer_reviews.author: danielle Kitchenman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: A really good smart tv for the price.... still trying to figure out how to download other apps to not! Not super intuitive!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Remote won't turn on TV
customer_reviews.text: This is maybe my second or third review. But this one is so bad I had to share. This TV is a bust. Won't turn on with remote and extremely hard to change the input. I wouldn't want anyone I know to buy this POS.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my RV and glad I did. Nice little tv
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: NEED WORK
customer_reviews.text: YOU CANT GET CABLE WITH OUT A EXTRA DECODER WHY TCL DOES IT
customer_reviews.author: car digg

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: That you couldn’t change the order of the programs that you see.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can’t beat this TV it worked out great in my camper and is all I needed. It meets or beats all expectations
customer_reviews.author: Ant1

product_meta.title: VIZIO D-Series 24” Class (23.80" Diag.) Smart TV
product_meta.description: Introducing the all new 2018 VIZIO D Series 24” class (23. 80" Diag. ) Smart TV with Full HD resolution and Smart Cast home – Our new streaming experience for easy access to your entertainment. Browse and launch popular apps like Netflix directly from the TV using the all new remote with Smart Cast TV℠. Use the VIZIO Smart Cast mobile app anywhere in the home to access additional entertainment, settings and playback controls all from your mobile screen. And with Chromecast built in, you can stream thousands of Chromecast enabled apps you know and love from your phone Straight to your TV.
feature_bullets: 23.5 inches screen (measured diagonally from corner to corner); A good size for a bedroom or dorm room
1080p resolution for stunning HD images; Watch Blu ray movies and 1080p HD content at their highest level of detail
Built in Wi Fi Smart TV means a huge world of entertainment; Stream movies, videos, music, and more
LED TVs perform well in all lighting conditions; They also deliver plasma like deep blacks and rich colors
Turn your phone into a powerful touchscreen remote; Simply tap to stream content to the big screen with the free VIZIO SmartCast Mobile app

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars232 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
